data.title: Gloria Gaynor Survive eau de parfum – Flowering Pharmacy
data.text:
Available in two sizes:

100 ml size glass atomizer bottle

3 ml sample size glass atomizer bottle

How to use: Apply fragrance on skin or clothing with a deliberate and generous spray.

Androgynous. Made in the USA.

Disclaimer: Before using a Flowering Pharmacy product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.

Gloria Gaynor’s legendary, half-century career shows no signs of slowing down. As a global star, Gloria’s remarkable talent has delivered chart-topping hit songs in each of the past five decades.

Channeling her fame and recognition into philanthropic efforts, Gloria often gives not only her money but also her time and talent to various charities. In one such project, she changed the lyrics to her world-renowned anthem, “I Will Survive”, and donated her time to create a new music video specifically for the Miami Children’s Hospital. Both the song and video were amplified to raise awareness and collect donations to fund the hospital’s lifesaving efforts.

Not one to sit still, Gloria recently spent time studying for and earning a Bachelor’s Degree in behavioral sciences. Among other partnerships, her degree will help expand her efforts with organizations that support at-risk youths and their families.

“‘I Will Survive’ is my mantra, the core of my God-given purpose,’” says the GRAMMY® award winner. “It is my privilege and honor to use it to inspire people around the world of every nationality, race, creed, color, and age group to join me as I sing and live the words: ‘I Will Survive.’”

Gloria continues to tour the world with her 10-piece band, performing in the U.S., Europe, South America, and beyond, and is active on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and TikTok (@GloriaGaynor). She also recently launched her YouTube channel spotlighting a mix of vintage concert and TV performances (be sure to subscribe and stay up to date on all her new iconic YouTube releases.)

We’re excited to announce our exclusive partnership with Gloria to create her first-ever signature. Its every bit as sparkly and vibrant as Gloria’s personality. A portion of the purchase price will help support children’s causes.
